des: "A sticky sweet and spicy sauce, this goes great on any wing - fried, grilled, baked, breaded, battered, or naked. Fantastic with your favorite blue cheese dip."
ins: Combine buffalo wing sauce, fig jam, bourbon, soy sauce, and garlic in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring often. Reduce heat and simmer sauce until thickened, 10 to 15 minutes. Let cool before serving, 10 to 15 minutes.
